name: Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers
summary: UFOs! Aliens! Aircrafts! Resistance! Shoot 'em up! Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environment. Enjoy a smart combination of a fast-paced shooting experience and the 1950's sci-fi movies aesthetic, with live-action cutscenes.
